sample

Class Property

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.Tile
      • sample.Ownable
        • sample.Property

  • public class Property
extends Ownable
    The class Property represents a property object with color, multiplier, property type, rent, owner, foot traffic and corresponding prices upon purchase. The rent list depends on the property type and number of houses owned by the player. It can determine if foot traffic limit has been reached.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Property(java.lang.String name)
      This constructor receives the property's name to be instantiated as an object.
